2315.T.summary: CAICA Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides information services in Japan and internationally. The company offers systems development services, including development and distribution of various business package software's for information service providers, such as financial strategy support systems for Internet banking for financial institutions; purchasing procurement systems using the Internet for manufacturers and distributors; and information processing systems and network monitoring systems for traders. It also provides finance industry solutions comprising accounts, information, legacy, financing, foreign exchange, sales branch terminals, Internet banking, and payment systems for banks; and in-house information management systems, asset management, consulting tools, etc. for various securities companies and securities system companies, as well as life and non-insurance SE solutions. In addition, the company offers ordering, MD, inventory warehouse management, logistics, B to C, B to B, customer management systems, etc. for the distribution industry that includes department stores, convenience stores, apparel industries, etc.; and customer management, mileage, ticket sale, accommodation reservation, content service, transportation/service industry, and other systems. Further, it provides manufacturing and public systems; and Web systems, which comprise construction, application design, and development system solutions. The company was formerly known as SJI Inc. and changed its name to CAICA Inc. in February 2017. CAICA Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2351.T.summary: ASJ Inc. engages in the setting up and management of servers on the Internet in Japan. The company also provides cloud, payment, and Internet consulting services; and designs and develops computer software and smartphone applications. In addition, it leases and manages real estate properties. Further, the company provides planning, production, and management of website, as well as web shop, logistics, and ERP software services. ASJ Inc. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Kawaguchi, Japan.

2428.T.summary: Wellnet Corporation provides payment settlement, electronic billing, and electronic payment services in Japan. The company also develops and provides mobile authentication solutions. In addition, it provides payment secretary, a smartphone app for making payments directly from bank account; BusMori!, a service to buy highway bus tickets and commuter passes; BusMori! MONTA to manage seats in real time on a tablet device; and SUPER SUB, a cloud service that provides event application reception, payment collection/ticketing, and authentication services, as well as multi-payment, electronic ticket, electronic authentication, convenience store cash receiving, invoice issuance and storage, remittance, and various application services. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3040.T.summary: Soliton Systems K.K., a technology company, provides IT security, remote live broadcasting, and embedded solutions in Japan and internationally. The company offers IT security products that include mailzen, soliton secure desktop, NetAttest D3, NetAttest LAP, and cyber space analytics.. It also provides mobile video transmission products comprising smart-telecaster ZAO, smart-telecaster Zao-S, smart-telecaster Zao-SH, ZAO App, HD view decoder/receiver, cloud view, cloud view switcher, and VMS Plus. In addition, the company offers advanced teleoperation products and data analytics. Soliton Systems K.K. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3042.T.summary: SecuAvail Inc. provides system security solutions in Japan. The company is involved in the design, construction, operation, monitoring, and log analysis of computer network security systems. Its products include NetStare, a network security operation monitoring system; LogStare integrated log management system; LogStare Collector, a network monitoring and log collection system; NetStare security diagnostic services; and NetStare Suite, a security operation service. SecuAvail Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3623.T.summary: Billing System Corporation provides settlement services in Japan. Its services include direct debit, payment slip settlement, convenience store settlement, real-time payment confirmation, settlement services, branch sales centralized services, smartphone multi-payment services, smartphone settlement, tablet payments, multi-money payment solution for vending machines, money transfer support, finance and billing agency, and payment services for utilities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3633.T.summary: GMO Pepabo, Inc. provides consumer-targeted Internet services in Japan. It operates through four segments: Hosting, Ecommerce Support, Customer to Customer (C2C), and Community. The Hosting segment offers consumer domain registration and web hosting services. The Ecommerce Support segment provides ecommerce platform solutions. The C2C segment offers marketplace for handmade products. The Community segment facilitates communication among Internet users through blogging. The company was formerly known as Paperboy&Co., Inc. and changed its name to GMO Pepabo, Inc. in March 2014. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. GMO Pepabo, Inc operates as a subsidiary of GMO Internet, Inc

3665.T.summary: Enigmo Inc. engages in online fashion retail business in Japan. The company operates BUYMA.com, a social fashion e-commerce Website that offers shopping experience through its escrow payment system and social shopping interface. Enigmo Inc. was founded in 2004 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3680.T.summary: Hottolink, Inc. offers social media marketing support that collects, analyzes, and utilizes social big data in Japan. It provides an information distribution platform that connects consumers and AI; and Twitter marketing support, Instagram marketing support, content marketing, social listening tool, market-specific media, and information dissemination services, as well as data analysis and video material. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3694.T.summary: OPTiM Corporation provides business-use smart device-related solutions in Japan. The company offers OPTiM Cloud Internet of Things OS services and apps; OPTiM Store, which offers a platform for selling business apps to suit various needs; Optimal Biz, which allows an IT administrator to manage IT devices in an office; and Optimal Remote, a support tool to provide support and reduce diagnostic time, as well as a maintenance tool to control terminals located in distant places. It also provides Unlimited Software, an all-you-can-use software service that provides software and e-books; Optia, which enables screen-sharing and remote operation for smartphone users; and OPTiM CafÃ©, a service that allows screen sharing without adapter for devices. In addition, the company offers Optimal Guard that enables users to stop/delete detected malware; and Optimal Diagnosis & Repair, a tool that diagnoses troubles and clarifies/repairs the cause of malfunctions on a device, as well as provides secure shields for mobile devices. Further, it provides e-books, digital magazines, and software packages for individual and business customers. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3741.T.summary: Systems Engineering Consultants Co.,LTD. provides real-time software and solutions in the public infrastructure and advanced technology fields in Japan. Its mobile networking business develops embedded software for various mobile devices, including smartphones and tablet PCs, mobile terminals and in-vehicle information terminals, and application technologies. The company's internet technology business develops embedded software for contactless IC cards and other application technologies, such as IoT-related technologies; and real-time technologies, including augmented reality, virtual reality, mixed reality, XML technologies, and cloud systems. Its public infrastructure business develops application technologies for public infrastructure fields, such as advanced transportation systems, defense-related systems, location information management systems, and systems for use in medical, environmental energy, and government offices. The company's space, robotics, and advanced technologies business offers embedded systems for scientific satellites, planetary probes, and astronomical telescopes control systems; and data analysis systems, as well as researches and develops robots; and development and consulting services on various uses of robotic systems. Its products also include RTMSafety, a robot middleware; Rtino, an indoor autonomous mobile robot software; and Rtrilo, a computer vision software for robots and other machines. Systems Engineering Consultants Co.,LTD. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3778.T.summary: SAKURA Internet Inc. provides internet connection services in Japan. The company offers housing services; and hosting services, such as dedicated and rental server, VPS, and cloud services. It is also involved in setting up and management of servers on the internet; and provision of various information services using the Internet, consulting on the Internet, and telecommunications services. In addition, the company designs, produces, and sells multimedia; designs, develops, and sells computer software; produces, sells, and maintains computers and computers peripherals; and leases and manages real estate properties. SAKURA Internet Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3788.T.summary: GMO GlobalSign Holdings K.K. engages in the development and operation of hosting services, security services, and various other Internet solutions in Japan and internationally. The company was formerly known as GMO Cloud K.K. and changed its name to GMO GlobalSign Holdings K.K. in September 2020. GMO GlobalSign Holdings K.K. was founded in 1993 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3850.T.summary: NTT Data Intramart Corporation provides software products and services in Japan and internationally. The company offers intra-mart, a package software to construct Web system bases. It also provides consultation services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3858.T.summary: Ubiquitous AI Corporation provides software products primarily in Japan. The companys products include Ubiquitous Securus, a secure data management solution using hardware secure IP; Ubiquitous TPM Security, a security software solution; Ubiquitous Network Framework, a network platform for IoT devices; Ubiquitous DTCP, a link protection middleware; Ubiquitous HDCP, a software development kit optimized for HDCP implementation; and Ubiquitous USB host platform. It also offers Ubiquitous WPA/WPS/Wi-Fi Direct, a software development kit for developing the functionalities necessary for wireless LAN clients to acquire the Wi-Fi certification logo; Ubiquitous QuickBoot, a fast boot solution for Linux and Android; and Ubiquitous DeviceSQL, a data management software for embedded systems. The company was formerly known as Ubiquitous Corporation and changed its name to Ubiquitous AI Corporation in July 2018. Ubiquitous AI Corporation founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3927.T.summary: Fuva Brain Limited develops and sells software products for end-point cyber security and white-collar productivity in Japan. The company also offers cyber security consulting services; and user support services. In addition, it resells network security products and offers related services. The company was formerly known as Ahkun Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuva Brain Limited in October 2018. Fuva Brain Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3960.T.summary: Valuedesign Inc. provides Valuecard ASP service in Japan. Valuecard ASP service is a system to issue and manage e-money, gift cards, and point cards. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3987.T.summary: Ecomott Inc. provides Internet of Things (IoT) and M2M solutions in Japan. It offers Yurimott, a snow-melting system remote supervision solution; Gembaroid, a computerized construction work support solution; FASTIO, an IoT platform solution; and Pdrive, a traffic accident avoidance solution. The company's solutions are used in network design and architecture, cloud application design and development, planning and proposal, system integration, device design and development, and assembly production industries. Ecomott Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Sapporo, Japan.

3992.T.summary: Needs Well Inc. engages in the IT service business in Japan. It provides NW Security Police, an in-house information security solution, which prevents unauthorized connection; VOTIRO Disarmer, an email or file sanitization solution; Symantec Web Isolation that protects web applications, data, and clients; and MobiControl, a mobile security and device management solutions. The company also offers IT reengineering services, an in-house system operation improvement consulting and data linkage system construction; WinActor, a business automation robot; SAP Concur, a cloud system for business trip, expense management, and invoice management; HotProfile, a business card management and sales tools; Work AI service, a business AI service; DX Suite, which converts all documents into high-precision digital data; and Speak Analyzer that visualizes communication in various business scenes, and support education and bottom-up measures for corporate employees. It offers information security, business efficiency, and artificial intelligence (AI) services in the areas of finance, connected, logistics, IT infrastructure, AI, robotic process automation, social infrastructure, distribution and service, telecommunication carrier, Web, and IT outsourcing. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3993.T.summary: PKSHA Technology Inc. develops algorithmic solutions. The company offers text comprehension module to understand the meaning of text data; HRUS, an area-specific image/video recognition engine that uses deep learning technology; and BEDORE, a general-purpose dialogue engine, which uses natural language processing technology. It also provides CELLOR, a CRM solution that emphasizes selling; and PREDICO, a prediction and inference engine. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3999.T.summary: KnowledgeSuite Inc. engages in cloud solution and system engineering businesses in Japan. The company offers Knowledge Suite, a cloud-type integrated business application; VCRM, an online negotiation tool that connects customers and sales staff through the Web; GEOCRM, a mobile CRM cloud service; ROBOT ID, an integrated management application that centrally manages various accounts used by companies; and SHELTER, a business application platform to unify operations and manage various data in companies. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4180.T.summary: Appier Group, Inc., a technology company, provides artificial intelligence (AI) platforms for enterprises to make data-driven decisions in Japan and internationally. Its products include AiDeal, an AI-based analytics solution for making purchase decisions; AIQUA, a user engagement platform that helps customers to engage end users across various marketing channels; AIXON, a data science platform that unifies existing customer data to help clients to understand audience and run AI models to predict their future action; and CrossX, a user acquisition platform. Appier Group, Inc. was founded in 2014 and is based in Minato, Japan.

4288.T.summary: Asgent, Inc. develops and distributes network security solutions for enterprises and medium sized organizations in Japan. The company offers managed security, network design/construction, assessment, consulting/auditing, and maintenance services. Asgent, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4391.T.summary: Logizard Co., Ltd., an application service provider, engages in the consultation, development, and sale of information systems for logistics and retail businesses in Japan and internationally. It offers barcode management, warehousing management, location management, and products management systems; and multi-language services. The company offers its solutions under the Logizard ZERO name. Logizard Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4430.T.summary: Tokai Soft Co., Ltd. provides factory automation and embedded software development and network infrastructure technology services. It offers artificial intelligence system, mission-critical system, production system, and automotive software development; IOT/M2M and mobile solutions; image processing; motor control, measurement, monitoring, and logistics; and embedded and visualization platform. The company also provides infrastructure construction services; Flex signal, an operation monitoring Web system; Flex Device, a cloud virtual system; business card management solution that electronically convert business cards; Knowledge solution, a business knowledge management tool; and PENTAS, a middleware. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

4431.T.summary: Smaregi, Inc. plans, designs, develops, and provides Web services. The company also offers Smaregi, a cloud type POS cash register system; Smaregi Waiter, an order management system that uses smartphones; and Smaregi - Time Card, a cloud-type attendance management service that manages attendance information, as well as provides payroll calculation, vacation management, shift management, daily report, and project management functions. It is also involved in data collection/analysis and mail order businesses. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

4434.T.summary: Serverworks Co.,Ltd. operates as a cloud integrator that provides integration business and service specialized for Amazon Web Services (AWS). The company is involved in planning, development, and operation of systems utilizing cloud computing; and AWS migration support and re-sale services. It also offers Cloud Automator, a service that automates AWS operations. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4435.T.summary: Kaonavi, Inc. provides cloud-based human resource management system. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4475.T.summary: HENNGE K.K. provides cloud security services worldwide. The company offers HENNGE One, a cloud-based identity and access management solution that offers single sign-on. It also provides HENNGE Secure Browser, which enables users to securely access cloud services federated with HENNGE One using HENNGE One account; and HENNGE OTP Generator, a virtual device application for multi-factor authentication that generates time-based one-time passwords complying with RFC 6238. The company was formerly known as HDE, Inc. and changed its name to HENNGE K.K. in February 2019. HENNGE K.K. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4494.T.summary: VarioSecure Inc. provides managed security services and security equipment sales services. The company's managed security services include business internet security, Vario-NSS, endpoint security, data Protect, email security, and fileflex. Its integration services comprise Vario communicate router and network integration. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4667.T.summary: Aisan Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, distributes, and maintains CAD systems for the public survey, registration surveying, civil engineering, and construction industries in Japan. The company offers surveying system solutions comprising WingNeoINFINITY, as well as facilitates the operation of functions and supporting new technologies, and customer's data backup service in Google storage; and calculation instrument solutions, such as ATStation, a non-prism electro-optical distance meter that enhances efficiency of monitoring at surveying sites, as well as motor-drive surveying instruments, GNSS surveying instruments, and laser scanners. It also provides 3D space data solutions, including mobile mapping systems consisting of 3 GPS units, 360 degrees cameras, laser scanners, etc.; ITS solutions; and medical solutions for various medical documents using handwritten character recognition and electronic signature technologies. In addition, the company develops analysis software and conversion modules for world coordinate systems; and researches and develops software used for the maintenance of 3D maps. Aisan Technology Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

4686.T.summary: JustSystems Corporation plans, develops, and provides software and related services primarily in Japan. The company offers Advanced Technology of Kana-Kanji transfer, a Japanese language input system for writing text in Japanese; and SMILE ZEMI, an e-learning system for elementary school students for study using a dedicated tablet device. It also provides Actionista!, a business intelligence tool that lets anyone engage in analysis; a suite of office-compatible software, such as JUST Office, JUST Government, and JUST Police to support the input of specific Japanese names and places; and ATOK Medical, a medical dictionary that enables conversion of complex disease and pharmaceutical names. The company serves individuals, private sector companies, government institutions, local municipalities, police forces, schools, and hospitals. JustSystems Corporation was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4687.T.summary: TDC SOFT Inc. provides IT consulting services in Japan. The company provides Agile, UX design, scrum training, scaled Agile framework, security, artificial intelligence consulting, and system integration infrastructure services and solutions. It also offers Stlyeflow, a cloud application for creating a web application form; Meepa, an EDI cloud system that digitizes transactions with partner companies; M-check+, a cloud application for stress check; and BP-LINKS, an EdI service that makes ordering, and monthly billing and settlement paperless. In addition, the company provides HuTaCT, a human resource talent management system; Trustpro, a cloud-based development framework; HANDyTRUSt application to support work efficiency and speedup related to work reports; and MoobizSync application to browse and update Salesforce standard and custom tabs from mobile. The company was formerly known as TDC Software Engineering Inc. and changed its name to TDC SOFT Inc. in October 2017. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6659.T.summary: Media Links Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets various technology solutions for broadcast industry in Japan, the United States, Europe, and Australia. The company offers Element Management System ProMD, a real time monitoring and troubleshooting network elements for media networks. It also provides media over IP transport solutions to broadcasters, telecoms, and network providers. In addition, it provides IP video router/switch systems; IP media gateway; and NetGazer, a network management software, as well as manufactures transmission equipment. The company was formerly known as Media Global Links Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Media Links Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Media Links Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Kawasaki, Japan.

6662.T.summary: Ubiteq, Inc. engages in the development and provision of IoT solutions. The company is involved in the design, manufacture, and quality assurance of electronic devices; design, development, and maintenance of software products; and provision of cloud services, as well as consulting on embedded system security. It also provides telematics platform to get the operation status of vehicles; car sharing platform for shared use of multiple vehicles; work mate system to support the safety of the workers; room concier, a meeting room management system; video conferencing system; and factory equipment real time monitoring system. In addition, the company offers health and safety/watching and data analysis solutions, as well as solutions for visualization of equipment operations. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Tokyo, Japan. Ubiteq, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of ORIX Corporation.

7351.T.summary: Goodpatch, Inc. provides UI/UX design consulting services. The company offers UI/UX design, business model design, brand experience design, organizational design, and software development services. It provides ReDesigner, a career support service for designers by design companies; ReDesigner for Student, a job hunting platform; Goodpatch Anywhere, a full remote design team; Strap, a cloud workspace; Prott, a prototyping tool for apps and services, and facilitating team collaboration; and Athena, an XR tool for designing and testing the connected car experience. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

762.F.summary: PKSHA Technology Inc. develops algorithmic solutions. The company offers text comprehension module to understand the meaning of text data; HRUS, an area-specific image/video recognition engine that uses deep learning technology; and BEDORE, a general-purpose dialogue engine, which uses natural language processing technology. It also provides CELLOR, a CRM solution that emphasizes selling; and PREDICO, a prediction and inference engine. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

9417.T.summary: Smartvalue Co., Ltd. provides cloud and mobile solutions in Japan. It offers SMART L-Gov, a cloud platform for solving various regional issues; GaaS (Government as a Service), an online administration platform; healthcare support; Mobility IoT, a mobility platform to solve the problems of the mobility society; Kuruma Base, a service that provides a platform for business operators engaged in the service of cars business; and AfterMarket For biz that handles various devices and services installed in vehicles for corporations. The company was founded in 1928 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

JSY.F.summary: JustSystems Corporation plans, develops, and provides software and related services primarily in Japan. The company offers Advanced Technology of Kana-Kanji transfer, a Japanese language input system for writing text in Japanese; and SMILE ZEMI, an e-learning system for elementary school students for study using a dedicated tablet device. It also provides Actionista!, a business intelligence tool that lets anyone engage in analysis; a suite of office-compatible software, such as JUST Office, JUST Government, and JUST Police to support the input of specific Japanese names and places; and ATOK Medical, a medical dictionary that enables conversion of complex disease and pharmaceutical names. The company serves individuals, private sector companies, government institutions, local municipalities, police forces, schools, and hospitals. JustSystems Corporation was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

RZC.MU.summary: CAICA Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides information services in Japan and internationally. The company offers systems development services, including development and distribution of various business package software's for information service providers, such as financial strategy support systems for Internet banking for financial institutions; purchasing procurement systems using the Internet for manufacturers and distributors; and information processing systems and network monitoring systems for traders. It also provides finance industry solutions comprising accounts, information, legacy, financing, foreign exchange, sales branch terminals, Internet banking, and payment systems for banks; and in-house information management systems, asset management, consulting tools, etc. for various securities companies and securities system companies, as well as life and non-insurance SE solutions. In addition, the company offers ordering, MD, inventory warehouse management, logistics, B to C, B to B, customer management systems, etc. for the distribution industry that includes department stores, convenience stores, apparel industries, etc.; and customer management, mileage, ticket sale, accommodation reservation, content service, transportation/service industry, and other systems. Further, it provides manufacturing and public systems; and Web systems, which comprise construction, application design, and development system solutions. The company was formerly known as SJI Inc. and changed its name to CAICA Inc. in February 2017. CAICA Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TD4.F.summary: TDC SOFT Inc. provides IT consulting services in Japan. The company provides Agile, UX design, scrum training, scaled Agile framework, security, artificial intelligence consulting, and system integration infrastructure services and solutions. It also offers Stlyeflow, a cloud application for creating a web application form; Meepa, an EDI cloud system that digitizes transactions with partner companies; M-check+, a cloud application for stress check; and BP-LINKS, an EdI service that makes ordering, and monthly billing and settlement paperless. In addition, the company provides HuTaCT, a human resource talent management system; Trustpro, a cloud-based development framework; HANDyTRUSt application to support work efficiency and speedup related to work reports; and MoobizSync application to browse and update Salesforce standard and custom tabs from mobile. The company was formerly known as TDC Software Engineering Inc. and changed its name to TDC SOFT Inc. in October 2017. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TMI.F.summary: Trend Micro Incorporated develops and sells security-related software for computers and the Internet primarily in Japan. The company offers hybrid cloud security solutions, such workload, container image, file storage, application, cloud network, and cloud conformity security solutions; and network security solutions, including intrusion prevention and threat protection solutions. It also provides user protection solutions comprising endpoint security, email and Web security, endpoint and gateway suites, SaaS application security, and endpoint detection and response; and support services. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TMICF.summary: Trend Micro Incorporated develops and sells security-related software for computers and the Internet primarily in Japan. The company offers hybrid cloud security solutions, such workload, container image, file storage, application, cloud network, and cloud conformity security solutions; and network security solutions, including intrusion prevention and threat protection solutions. It also provides user protection solutions comprising endpoint security, email and Web security, endpoint and gateway suites, SaaS application security, and endpoint detection and response; and support services. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TMICY.summary: Trend Micro Incorporated develops and sells security-related software for computers and the Internet primarily in Japan. The company offers hybrid cloud security solutions, such workload, container image, file storage, application, cloud network, and cloud conformity security solutions; and network security solutions, including intrusion prevention and threat protection solutions. It also provides user protection solutions comprising endpoint security, email and Web security, endpoint and gateway suites, SaaS application security, and endpoint detection and response; and support services. The company was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
